items: (82) Hexin Xi, Yiyuan Teresa Huang, Amit Yaron, Tomoyo I Shiramatsu, Zenas Chao, Hirokazu Takahashi: “Audiovisual Rabbit Illusion and multimodal Mismatch Negativity: A Dual Approach to Investigate Multisensory Integration.” The 10th Mismatch Negativity Conference, p.120, 2024(Salamanca, Spain, 2024年9月17日)

(83) Shinichi Kumagai, Tomoyo I Shiramatsu, Karin Oshima, Kensuke Kawai, Hirokazu Takahashi: “Cortical entrainment to the periodic auditory signals modulated by vagus nerve stimulation.” Advances and Perspectives in Auditory Neuroscience., 2024 (Chicago, USA, 2024年10月4日)

(84) Shinichi Kumagai, Tomoyo I Shiramatsu, Karin Oshima, Kensuke Kawai, Hirokazu Takahashi: “The entrainment to rapid auditory input modulated by vagus nerve stimulation.” Society for Neuroscience, 2024 (Chicago, USA, 2024年10月5日)
